statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_address DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT email, phone_number, first_name, last_name FROM sales_representatives WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT id, email, address, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT phone_number, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890' OR phone_number='987-654-3210';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM sales_representatives JOIN customer_data ON sales_representatives.id = customer_data.id WHERE customer_name='ABC Inc.';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT rep_id, first_name, region FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'West' ORDER BY first_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'North' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT rep_id, name, territory FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 5;
SELECT products.name, products.price, sales_representatives.name AS rep_name FROM products JOIN sales_representatives ON products.product_id = sales_representatives.rep_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesRepresentatives;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT stat_id, total_sales, commission FROM SalesStats WHERE total_sales >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM SalesRepresentatives WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT sales_rep_id, total_sales, commission FROM SalesStats GROUP BY sales_rep_id HAVING total_sales > 50000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
